attributes.action: Immediately deport from the  UK , Asylum seekers, illegal immigrants, refugees, for all serious criminal offences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give full power to the judges in our Law System to deport any asylum seekers, refugees, illegal immigrants, immediately  they have been convicted of causing a serious criminal offence,ie, murder, rape,etc,  rather than burdening the British taxpayer, with the cost of keeping these foreigners in jail for months/years on end.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
